FAQ

1. How do I enter my IRP5?

Drag-and-drop the PDF into the “Income & IRP5” section.

2. What is the 27.5 % RA limit?

You may deduct up to 27.5% of remuneration or R 350 000, whichever is lower.

3. Where is my data stored?

Only in your browser; nothing is uploaded (POPIA compliant).

4. How accurate is the calculation?

Results match SARS 2025 tables to the cent.

5. How do I pay SARS?

Use the eFiling Guide link in the navigation bar.
